message.body: I'd like to come home next week and I'm flexible on dates - I could do Sunday to Sunday but I'm not sure about the Monday of October yet
I can't wait! Just let dan know the day you want to come home.Sunday would be great to pick you up
I was wondering if you could let Dan know and check with him about which days
Sure. I will email him tonight
I'm so glad you called with the good news. I can't wait for you to be home. Love love love
Our data usage is almost used up so be careful the next couple of days.
Dan just called and I told him most likely Saturday aft would work. He just needs you know if anytime on sat aft would work? Or does it have to be later on the day. Better to text him direct ly
